name: VR Murder Crime investigation: Dark Jungle Pro
name_original: VR Murder Crime investigation: Dark Jungle Pro
description:
Take your step into a real haunted house and found a key to unlock every door. Be careful at every step. Many stories are still in lime light about this house. Some seen Slendrina in this haunted house some hear the sound of evil. But you don't get scared. Find the key of every door and solve every case which are being in relation of this haunted house.
Features
Real haunted house.
Find the key to unlock door.
Wear vr glasses to find Slendrina.
